description.text: [Description]: This element defines group identify on related user. It defines group in which user belongs to. At this time, group should be defined in <groups><group><name></name></group></groups>.
[Description]: This element is configuration on account. Within it, users and groups can be defined.
[Description]: This element defines user name on related User. This should be unique as "primary" identify.
[Description]: It defines subgroup in which group belongs to. At this time, group should be defined in <groups><group><name></name></group></groups>.
[Description]: Explaination on User. [Value Description]: Temporary Explaination Statement [Example]: <description>A really nice guy!</description>
[Description]: This element configures Password on User.
[Description]: This deines group name on related Group. This should be unique as "primary" identify.
[Description]: Explaination on Group. [Value Description]: Temporary Explaination Statement
